title: New Luxury Resort Opening Up in Samana, Dominican RepublicTravelandtourworld.com
text:
New Luxury Resort Opening Up in Samana, Dominican Republic Published on : Saturday, September 19, 2015
Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts, the largest resort operator in the Dominican Republic, will be opening up its 12th property in the country on November 1, 2015 with the new Victorian style Luxury Bahia Principe Samana Don Pablo Collection. Elegant, boutique style, this 149-room Don Pablo Collection resort will be adult only. Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts is a premium resort division under one of the world’s leading travel companies Grupo Piñero based in Mallorca, Spain. Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts features 18 fun-filled resorts in the Dominican Republic, Mexico and Jamaica and an additional four more resorts in Spain.
“This is the smallest resort in our inventory with only 149 rooms so perfect for those adults looking for a more romantic, peaceful and secluded getaway but with all the special touches and amenities Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts are known for,” said Julio Perez, Executive Vice President of Bahía Principe Hotels & Resorts.
Luxury Bahia Principe Samana is located along the north coast of the country approximately 45 km from the Samana airport. The resort is on a beautiful stretch of beach and most guests have scenic unobstructed views of Samana Bay and Caribbean Sea. The 149-room property is housed on five floors with two buildings and features 40 junior suite rooms, 78 superior rooms and 31 standard rooms. There is one pool, four bars and three international restaurants from casual to fine dining and will satisfy even the most discerning palate from local specialties to international cuisine.
This resort is part of the Don Pablo Collection which means exceptional service, activities and standards for guests. Luxury comfort with relaxed elegance awaits all guests. Butler service, pillow menu, 24-hour room service, four poster bed, rooms filled with amenities from coffee makers to satellite TV, night turn-down service are just some of the benefits and services guests can expect.
Resort guests of the Samana property will have a free boat transfer to the nearby public beach on Cayo Levantado or Bacardi Island as it is affectionately known. This is one of the most beautiful beaches in the Caribbean and home to the flagship Luxury Bahia Principe Cayo Levantado.
For guests looking to explore, Samana provides a host of activities no matter what the interest. Deep sea fishing, scuba diving, kite-surfing, snorkeling, sailing, and whale watching are some of the more popular water activities. On land less than 30 minutes away why not go horseback riding to the El Limon 40 meter high waterfall. Take a short boat ride to Cayo Levantado or as it is affectionately known as Bacardi Island.
Luxury Bahia Principe Samana is ideal for honeymooners or couples who enjoy a tranquil and relaxed getaway. Bookings are being accepted now through travel agents or you can learn more by visiting www.bahia-principe.com.
Book now and you can save anywhere from 10% to 33% off regular prices at the new Samana property of any of Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts’ in the Dominican Republic, Mexico and Jamaica with Early Booking Bonuses. The early booking bonus (EBB) is valid for travel from January 2, 2016 to January 1, 2017 on any of its resorts in the Caribbean and Mexico. The early booking bonus expires October 31, 2015.
Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts are well-known for their exceptionally high standard of service, cuisine, guest rooms and resort amenities and activities and have garnered many awards for its resorts, cuisine and service. Since 1995 when they opened their first resort, the Bahia Principe San Juan in the Dominican Republic, the brand has now grown to 12 properties in that country, four resorts in Mexico and two in Jamaica.
